column4: Hey guys. I just used Synaptic Package Manager to install Pure-FTP Server. I restarted gnome-panel but I still cant find the launcher for the program
it may not have it
some programs don't
if it is a server, it is a probably a command-line thing
you need an ftp server or client?
most servers on linux do not have guis for very good reasons
no idea, I have never set up a ftp server
why not just use sharing?
shouldn't be
also why? I have heard a lot od people say not to reccomend it but dont knwo why
see the above statement by ubotu
that is true. I have found that I am always asking myself why it is having me do what i am doing
should I use Samba or NFS to setup sharing?
samba, if you have windows friends
all my friends run windows. As a matter of fact the reasson I am trying to get into linux is b/c I want to get into network security and a lot of IT stuff. Everyone I talk to says Learn LInux and C
you can do network security on windows, it is not pretty (I have an MCP, for the record)
MCP?
Microsoft Certified Professional (Windows 2000 server)
knowledge of both is useful. You will get more money by doing linux stuff
I am still in high school guys so I have a lot of time to learn, but i like to be ahead

to boil it down, the FSF don't like the term Open source
